post.author: Admin
post.title: NRMB Newsletter – February 13, 2017
post.description:
Open chairposition: Fruit Sale Chairpeople (2) Needed: contact: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299
LINKS yo
post.content:
Open chairposition:

Fruit Sale Chairpeople (2) Needed: contact: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!

DATES you need to know:

  • February 20 – Five Guys Fundraiser – 5-8pm Download Flyer!
  • February 27– Band Booster Meeting 7pm in Media Center
  • February 28 – High School Contest Concert 7pm PAC

OMEA Solo/Ensemble Event

Congrats to all our solo and ensemble members that performed at TriC West on February 11th. FANTASTIC job… I heard so many amazing performances as I was waiting and walking through the hallways…. Always proud to represent NRHS BAND! Keep up the amazing musical work

Munching for Music – Five Guys

Munch for Music at the new Strongsville location of FIVE GUYS! Located just south of Royalton Road on the east side of Pearl Road, Five Guys is once again extending to us the opportunity to EAT for $$$$! Flyer is attached! Tell your friends, family and POST on your social media platforms. All they have to say is that they are with the North Royalton Band and we can receive up to 25% profit on their purchase.

OPEN Chairposition

As mentioned above, we are in need of TWO people to chair our Fruit Sale next year. I can honestly say that I have worked with Susie and Karen this year and these gals have TOTALLY organized this committee and have fantastic notes for you to follow for next year. Consider volunteering NOW since both Karen and Susie are available to go over everything with you for next year! Call Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 or Susie Perez 440-877-1299 if you are interested in volunteering. It is a FUN committee!!

Mark Your Calendar - Basket Raffle

Our annual Basket Raffle event will be MAY 6th and 3Spot in North Royalton. The 3Spot will be giving us the MAIN DINING room for our event this year! So mark your calendar and we will be getting more information out soon.
